item.description:
UPDATE: we need all the help we can get.  we'll have a representative from the official campaign with telephones and caller lists so we can additionally do some phonebanking!

 

http://www.facebook.c... Here's a video of our last sign-making event: http://www.facebook.c... Park in lot across the street under the highway. We're on the 4th floor. Call Shem at (413) 230-12 45 if you get lost. We'll be on the fourth floor. We're going to make stencils and signs. If you can, please bring red and/or black spray paint, long pieces of cardboard, tarps, canvas, and any other materials you might think may appropriate. If you have some money to spend grab a roll of TYVEK HomeWrap ( http://www.homedepot.... ). And don't wear anything you don't want to see get painted! We'll have plenty of water and likely go out for food and drink after we're done.
item.name: Worcester Sign-Making Party & Phonebank
